title: Studies. A: Maple Grove, Greensboro, Vt. B: Oak Trees at Lake Dunmore, Vt.
medium: A: Pen and black ink, gouache and pencil B: Pen and black ink,  watercolor, and colored pencil.
description: A: Horizontal Rectangle. B: Vertical rectangle. A: A grove standing at a hillside. Framing ink lines. B: A group of oaks is shown in the foreground, standing at a hillside with a meadow. A wood is in the left background. caption and date written in pencil at the bottom. High bottom margin.
name: Drawing
